indexes.name: flyway_schema_history_pk
indexes.def: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX flyway_schema_history_pk ON public.flyway_schema_history USING btree (installed_rank)

indexes.name: flyway_schema_history_s_idx
indexes.def: CREATE INDEX flyway_schema_history_s_idx ON public.flyway_schema_history USING btree (success)

tables.name: atp.media
tables.comment: stores media data for movies, tv shows, and tv seasons

columns.name: hash
columns.comment: primary key; unique identifier; and primary element for interaction with transmission

columns.name: media_type
columns.comment: either movie, tv_shows, or tv_season

columns.name: media_title
columns.comment: either movie or tv show title

columns.name: season
columns.comment: media season if tv show or tv season; null for movies

columns.name: episode
columns.comment: episode number within season for tv show, otherwise null

columns.name: release_year
columns.comment: year the movie was released or the year of the first season of a tv show

columns.name: pipeline_status
columns.comment: status within the automatic transmission pipeline

columns.name: error_status
columns.comment: boolean value documenting errors occurring during pipeline

columns.name: error_condition
columns.comment: details on error status

columns.name: rejection_status
columns.comment: rejection status based on filters within filter-parameters.json

columns.name: rejection_reason
columns.comment: details on which filter flags were tagged, if rejection was caused

columns.name: parent_path
columns.comment: parent dir of media library location for item

columns.name: target_path
columns.comment: file or dir path for media library location

columns.name: original_title
columns.comment: raw item title string value; used for parsing other field values

columns.name: original_path
columns.comment: original path of item within media-cache

columns.name: original_link
columns.comment: may contain either the direct download link or the magnet link

columns.name: rss_source
columns.comment: source of rss feed for item ingestion, if any

columns.name: uploader
columns.comment: uploading entity of the media item

columns.name: imdb_id
columns.comment: from TMDB; IMDB identifier for media item

columns.name: tmdb_id
columns.comment: from TMDB; identifier for themoviedb.org API

columns.name: budget
columns.comment: from TMDB; production budget of media item

columns.name: revenue
columns.comment: from TMDB; current revenue of media item

columns.name: runtime
columns.comment: from TMDB; runtime in minutes of media item

columns.name: origin_country
columns.comment: from TMDB; primary country of production in iso_3166_1 format

columns.name: production_companies
columns.comment: from TMDB; array of production companies

columns.name: production_countries
columns.comment: from TMDB; array of countries where media item was produced in iso_3166_1 format

columns.name: production_status
columns.comment: from TMDB; current production status of media item

columns.name: original_language
columns.comment: from TMDB; primary language of media item in ISO 639 format

columns.name: spoken_languages
columns.comment: from TMDB; array of languages available encoded in ISO 639 format

columns.name: genre
columns.comment: from TMDB; array of genres associated with the movie

columns.name: original_media_title
columns.comment: from TMDB; original title of media item

columns.name: tagline
columns.comment: from TMDB; tagline for the media item

columns.name: overview
columns.comment: from TMDB; brief plot synopsis of media item

columns.name: tmdb_rating
columns.comment: from TMDB; rating submitted by TMDB users out of 10

columns.name: tmdb_votes
columns.comment: from TMDB; number of ratings by TMDB users

columns.name: rt_score
columns.comment: from OMDb; Rotten Tomatoes score out of 100

columns.name: metascore
columns.comment: from OMDb; MetaCritic score out of 100

columns.name: imdb_rating
columns.comment: from OMDb; IMDB rating out of 100

columns.name: imdb_votes
columns.comment: from OMDb; number of votes on IMDB

columns.name: resolution
columns.comment: video resolution

columns.name: video_codec
columns.comment: video compression codec

columns.name: upload_type
columns.comment: uploading type indicating source of upload

columns.name: audio_codec
columns.comment: audio codec

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: timestamp for initial database creation of item

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: timestamp of last database alteration of item

indexes.name: media_pkey
indexes.def: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX media_pkey ON atp.media USING btree (hash)

indexes.name: idx_media_imdb_id
indexes.def: CREATE INDEX idx_media_imdb_id ON atp.media USING btree (imdb_id)

indexes.name: idx_media_tmdb_id
indexes.def: CREATE INDEX idx_media_tmdb_id ON atp.media USING btree (tmdb_id)

indexes.name: idx_media_pipeline_status
indexes.def: CREATE INDEX idx_media_pipeline_status ON atp.media USING btree (pipeline_status)

triggers.name: update_media_updated_at
triggers.def: CREATE TRIGGER update_media_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON atp.media FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION atp.update_updated_at_column()

triggers.name: reset_fields_on_ingestion
triggers.def: CREATE TRIGGER reset_fields_on_ingestion BEFORE UPDATE ON atp.media FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION atp.reset_on_ingestion()

triggers.name: clear_error_condition
triggers.def: CREATE TRIGGER clear_error_condition BEFORE UPDATE ON atp.media FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION atp.reset_error_condition()

triggers.name: clear_rejection_reason
triggers.def: CREATE TRIGGER clear_rejection_reason BEFORE UPDATE ON atp.media FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION atp.reset_rejection_reason()

tables.name: atp.training
tables.comment: stores training data to be ingested by reel-driver

columns.name: imdb_id
columns.comment: from TMDB; IMDB identifier for media item, and the primary key for this column

columns.name: tmdb_id
columns.comment: from TMDB; identifier for themoviedb.org API

columns.name: label
columns.comment: training label enum value for model ingestion

columns.name: human_labeled
columns.comment: flag value that indicates a user change of the label value

columns.name: anomalous
columns.comment: user set flag for media items frequently appear as false postives or false negatvies in model results, but have been verified to be correct

columns.name: media_type
columns.comment: either movie, tv_shows, or tv_season

columns.name: media_title
columns.comment: either movie or tv show title

columns.name: season
columns.comment: media season if tv show or tv season; null for movies

columns.name: episode
columns.comment: episode number within season for tv show, otherwise null

columns.name: release_year
columns.comment: year the movie was released or the year of the first season of a tv show

columns.name: budget
columns.comment: from TMDB; production budget of media item

columns.name: revenue
columns.comment: from TMDB; current revenue of media item

columns.name: runtime
columns.comment: from TMDB; runtime in minutes of media item

columns.name: origin_country
columns.comment: from TMDB; primary country of production in iso_3166_1 format

columns.name: production_companies
columns.comment: from TMDB; array of production companies

columns.name: production_countries
columns.comment: from TMDB; array of countries where media item was produced in iso_3166_1 format

columns.name: production_status
columns.comment: from TMDB; current production status of media item

columns.name: original_language
columns.comment: from TMDB; primary language of media item in ISO 639 format

columns.name: spoken_languages
columns.comment: from TMDB; array of languages available encoded in ISO 639 format

columns.name: genre
columns.comment: from TMDB; array of genres associated with the movie

columns.name: original_media_title
columns.comment: from TMDB; original title of media item

columns.name: tagline
columns.comment: from TMDB; tagline for the media item

columns.name: overview
columns.comment: from TMDB; brief plot synopsis of media item

columns.name: tmdb_rating
columns.comment: from TMDB; rating submitted by TMDB users out of 10

columns.name: tmdb_votes
columns.comment: from TMDB; number of ratings by TMDB users

columns.name: rt_score
columns.comment: Rotten Tomatoes score

columns.name: metascore
columns.comment: MetaCritic score

columns.name: imdb_rating
columns.comment: IMDB rating out of 100

columns.name: imdb_votes
columns.comment: number of votes on IMDB

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: timestamp for initial database creation of item

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: timestamp of last database alteration of item

columns.name: reviewed
columns.comment: deterines if training label has been confirmed as accurate

indexes.name: training_pkey
indexes.def: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX training_pkey ON atp.training USING btree (imdb_id)

indexes.name: training_tmdb_id_key
indexes.def: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX training_tmdb_id_key ON atp.training USING btree (tmdb_id)

indexes.name: idx_training_tmdb_id
indexes.def: CREATE INDEX idx_training_tmdb_id ON atp.training USING btree (tmdb_id)

triggers.name: trg_training_update_timestamp
triggers.def: CREATE TRIGGER trg_training_update_timestamp BEFORE UPDATE ON atp.training FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION atp.trg_fn_training_update_timestamp()

tables.name: atp.prediction
tables.comment: stores training data to be ingested by reel-driver

columns.name: imdb_id
columns.comment: IMDB identifier for media item, and the primary key for this column

columns.name: prediction
columns.comment: model prediction value, 1 for would_watch and 0 for would_not_watch

columns.name: probability
columns.comment: probability of would_watch on 0 to 1 scale

columns.name: cm_value
columns.comment: confusion matrix value, either ture positive, true negative, false postivie or false negative

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: timestamp for initial database creation of item

indexes.name: prediction_pkey
indexes.def: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX prediction_pkey ON atp.prediction USING btree (imdb_id)

triggers.name: trg_prediction_update_timestamp
triggers.def: CREATE TRIGGER trg_prediction_update_timestamp BEFORE UPDATE ON atp.prediction FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION atp.trg_fn_prediction_update_timestamp()

indexes.name: engineered_pkey
indexes.def: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX engineered_pkey ON atp.engineered USING btree (imdb_id)

tables.name: atp.movies
tables.comment: Combined view of training and prediction data joined by imdb_id
tables.def:
CREATE VIEW movies AS (
 SELECT t.imdb_id,
    t.tmdb_id,
    t.label,
    t.human_labeled,
    t.anomalous,
    t.media_type,
    t.media_title,
    t.season,
    t.episode,
    t.release_year,
    t.budget,
    t.revenue,
    t.runtime,
    t.origin_country,
    t.production_companies,
    t.production_countries,
    t.production_status,
    t.original_language,
    t.spoken_languages,
    t.genre,
    t.original_media_title,
    t.tagline,
    t.overview,
    t.tmdb_rating,
    t.tmdb_votes,
    t.rt_score,
    t.metascore,
    t.imdb_rating,
    t.imdb_votes,
    t.reviewed,
    p.prediction,
    p.probability,
    p.cm_value,
    t.created_at AS training_created_at,
    t.updated_at AS training_updated_at,
    p.created_at AS prediction_created_at
   FROM (atp.training t
     JOIN atp.prediction p ON (((t.imdb_id)::text = (p.imdb_id)::text)))
)

driver.name: postgres
driver.database_version: PostgreSQL 17.5 on x86_64-pc-linux-musl, compiled by gcc (Alpine 14.2.0) 14.2.0, 64-bit
